episodes.synopsis: A favor for an old drinking buddy leads Hank and Britt, small-time private eyes, down a rabbit hole of corruption in deceptively sunny Ocean Beach.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Desperate for quick cash, Hank and Britt set out to capture escaped convict Mongo for a big chunk of reward money.
episodes.title: Dog and Pony

episodes.synopsis: In order to secure a loan, Hank must prove that the bank manager's wife is cheating on him, but what he discovers is much kinkier than infidelity.
episodes.title: Change Partners

episodes.synopsis: Robert Lindus is back from jail with an unusual request: He wants Hank and Britt to steal a quarter of a million dollars from him.
episodes.title: Fustercluck

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Britt deal with the widening scope of the Lindus conspiracy as they try to avoid the rap for a murder they (technically) didn't commit.
episodes.title: Manifest Destiny

episodes.synopsis: The search for an antique engagement ring takes Hank and Britt on a wild goose chase through the more colorful parts of Ocean Beach.
episodes.title: Ring-a-Ding-Ding

episodes.synopsis: Hank and Britt help a college student suffering from amnesia recover his forgotten identity.
episodes.title: Missing Persons

episodes.synopsis: Separated and in danger, Hank and Britt must both work with their ex-partners to make it out of some hot water south of the border.
episodes.title: Agua Caliente

episodes.synopsis: While Hank recovers from his injury, Britt teams up with a transvestite hooker to solve the mystery of her friend's death.
episodes.title: Pimp Daddy

episodes.synopsis: Fighting the urge to drink on Gretchen's wedding day, Hank stumbles back onto the radar of the conspiracy threatening Ocean Beach.
episodes.title: Asunder

episodes.synopsis: A mystery that spans multiple time periods gives Hank a second shot at the rape case that got him ejected from the police department.
episodes.title: Sins of the Past

episodes.synopsis: Hank, Britt and new ally Laura Ross unravel the Ocean Beach conspiracy, which puts them and everyone they love in imminent danger.
episodes.title: Quid Pro Quo

episodes.synopsis: Still reeling from his loss, Hank runs out of options and out of time. Meanwhile, Britt faces a life-changing decision.
episodes.title: Hail Mary

video.title: Terriers
video.synopsis: Scruffy ex-cop and recovering alcoholic Hank is an unlicensed detective who solves crimes with street smarts, and help from his ex-con best pal Britt.
